sentence.idiomatic: The Democratic Party replaced the Republican Party to become the ruling party.
Xiao Wang became the principal instead of him.
Mr. Zhang is sick. Who can replace him to go to Beijing?
In China, the party in power is the Communist Party.
The party in power lost their votes in this election.
Is the Republican party the ruling party of America?
China is a socialist nation.
We will develop a socialist nation with Chinese characteristics.
In order to build socialism, we must develop a socialist civilization.
Shanghai is an industrialized city.
Deng Xiaoping put forward the Four Modernizations.
We decided to go the internationalized route.
Chairman Mao always emphasized that we must serve the people.
The manager emphasized we should have a good attitude.
He emphasized again the importance of being independent.
We should be good youths with ideals.
What were your ideals when you were young?
His ideals haven’t been realized yet.
In 1949 Mao Zedong announced the establishment of the People's Republic of China on Tian’ anmen Tower.
The People's Liberation Army won the War of Resistance against Japan and the War to Liberate China.
The Chinese Communist Party replaced the KMT, and became the governing party, China became a socialist country, Mao Zedong’s ideal was to build China into an industrialized socialist nation.
After Mao's death in 1976, Deng Xiaoping became the General Secretary of the Communist Party of China. Under his leadership, China has rapidly become a socialist nation with Chinese characteristics.
In the process of modernization, Deng Xiaoping has put forward the Four Modernizations.
